nodes.text: Clamfruit was a type of edible fruit that had a peel, juice, and a briny scent. Four months after the Hosnian Cataclysm, in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, the Blutopian Oga Garra ate clamfruit during her first meeting with the human Vi Moradi, who found the fruit's smell unpleasant. Garra threw a clamfruit rind at Moradi when the Resistance spy would not volunteer information, and she spattered Moradi's face with clamfruit juice while warning the human against getting on Garra's bad side.
Clamfruit first appeared in the canon novel Galaxy's Edge: Black Spire, which was written by Delilah S. Dawson and published in 2019.
